Core Essence
A narrative style blending classical poetic lyricism with modern technique. Prose is like warm, polished jadeâ€”smooth and lustrous on the surface, containing the heavy sorrow of time and inescapable nostalgia. It settles vast historical changes and acute pain into subtle shifts in everyday details, creating a sorrowful, exquisite beauty that is â€œå“€è€Œä¸ä¼¤ï¼Œè‰³è€Œä¸ä¿—â€.

Core Elements

Temporal Juxtaposition: Constructs tragedy through the resonance of â€œthenâ€ (mainland, youth, prosperity) and â€œnowâ€ (Taiwan, old age, desolation). Time is the silent protagonist.

Aesthetic of Detail: Charactersâ€™ fates and inner states are entrusted to objects: the hue of a cheongsam, a turn of Kunqu melody, a fading photograph.

Gaze upon â€œMarginal Figuresâ€: Focuses on â€œremnantsâ€ washed away by historyâ€™s tide or social â€œoutliers,â€ portraying their forgotten dignity with compassion.

Poetic Vernacular: Integrates the imagery, rhythm, andæ„å¢ƒ of classical poetry into modern narrative. Language is fluent yet concise, rich in musicality.

â€œCool Eyeâ€ & â€œWarm Heartâ€: The narrator observes with calm detachment, yet beneath lies deep sympathyâ€”a case of â€œçƒ­è‚ æŒ‚ä½ï¼Œå†·çœ¼çœ‹ç©¿â€.

Tone & Rhythm
Tone is elegant, serene, reserved, like a scholar narrating unhurriedly. Rhythm is slow and lingering, akin to drawn-out Kunqu melodies. Sentences vary: short ones are clear as paintings; long ones contain layered complexities of emotion and time. The effect is elegiac.

Dialogue

Refined, implicit, fitting the charactersâ€™ era and status, often carrying old-world etiquette.

Heavy use of subtext; true emotions are concealed within polite formulas, allusions, or silence.

Reveals relationships, class, and turmoil through speech rhythm, word choice, and avoided topics.

Avoids blunt arguments; conflict resides in subtle shifts in tone, a well-placed allusion, or a sigh.

Atmosphere

Vanished Splendor: Contrasts the mansions and bustle of the past with the apartments and quiet streets of the present.

Exquisite Decay: The rustle of silk, haze of opium, greasiness of dishes, damp of rainy season, intensity of night-blooming jasmine.

Light & Shadow: Skillful use of moonlight, dusk, and lamplight to evoke mood and hint at fate.

Seasonal Imagery: Plants and seasons closely correspond to charactersâ€™ virtues and destinies.

How People Behave

Amid irretrievable loss, characters cling to maintaining dignity or memory; this â€œperseveranceâ€ is their self-respect.

Emotional expression is extremely restrained; deepest feelings are conveyed through a gesture, a meal, a gaze upon an old object.

Tragedy stems from the irreconcilable conflict between personal feeling and historical currents or duty.

Even depicting downfall, the writing carries a tone ofä¸å¿ and compassion, granting characters spiritual stature.

Stylistic Techniques

Layering of Imagery: Superimposes emotion-laden images (â€œmoonlight,â€ â€œfading flowers,â€ â€œold tunesâ€) to create denseæ„å¢ƒ.

Color Symbolism: Uses culturally charged colors (moon-white, indigo, scarlet) to delineate character and foreshadow fate.

Intertextuality & Allusion: Incorporates classical poetry and historical references to deepen themes and connect to cultural memory.

Joyful Scenes Convey Sorrow: Within bustling prosperity (feasts, gatherings), captures inner loneliness and premonition of decline.

Negative Space & Lingering Resonance: Often concludes at a moment of implicit intensity, leaving silence for the melancholy to resonate.

Binding Image
Like listening to an old Shanghai record on a damp Taipei spring night, the faint vocals wrapped in the static of years. Outside gleams unfamiliar neon; inside, the listener sits in silence. In that moment, the vanished light, the shattered landscape, the personalæ²§æ¡‘â€”all coalesce, throughæè‡´ restraint, into a single, warm and smooth, eternal tear suspended in amber.

Core Essence
A narrative that depicts love and desire as a slow, viscous fusion. It rejects explosive passion for a lingering, cloying, mutual permeation. Love is a physico-chemical process: two substances gradually losing their boundaries within a warm torpor, merging into a new, inseparable entity.

Core Elements

Viscous Fusion: The core aesthetic is â€œslow mixing.â€ Desire is infiltration, envelopment, mutual dissolutionâ€”focused on a dense, connective texture.

Verbs of Physical Blending: Emphasizes slow, pressuring actions that cause deformation: â€œknead,â€ â€œpermeate,â€ â€œblur,â€ â€œsubmerge.â€ Depicts slow possession and assimilation.

Gustatory Synesthesia: Love is analogous to syrup, honey, melting cheeseâ€”highlighting cloying adhesion and slow dissolution at body temperature.

â€œSlow Breathâ€ Rhythm: Sentences stretch like pulled candy, withè¿ç»µ clauses and layered sensory details, creating a sweet, near-suffocating immersion.

Warm, Torpid Imagery: Core images are warm, viscous fluids (honey, hot oil) and soft, malleable solids (dough, warm wax). Settings are thermostatic and enclosed.

Tone & Rhythm
Tone is intoxicated, murmuring, somatically languid. Rhythm is extremely slow, like dripping syrup. Long sentences weave dense sensory webs, immersing the reader in viscous time.

Dialogue

Emerges like bubbles through thick airâ€”short, damp, ambiguous.

Speech intertwines with sighs, swallows, subtle friction; words become sensory background.

What matters is the mingling of breath, minute saliva exchange, the damp traces in warm air.

Silence is the fullest state of amalgamationâ€”a wordless, viscous mutual saturation.

Atmosphere

Spaces: Thermostatic and enclosed: bedrooms on summer afternoons, steam-filled bathrooms.

Materials: Adsorbent: velvet, silk, damp soil, human skin.

Light: Slow-moving: shafts seeping through blinds, swaying underwater light.

Scents: Cloying, stifling: floral notes mixed with body warmth, overripe fruit, the steam of sweat.

How People Behave

Characters seek to sink deeper into the medium of each otherâ€™s existence, governed by warm lethargy.

Intimacy is microscopic, continuous mutual shaping: combing sweat-damp hair, sharing food, embracing until warmth blurs.

Conflict is gentle stalemate, sweet corrosion, the agony of being too viscous to separate cleanly.

An ending is the medium of fusion slowly cooling, solidifying, entombing both in amber.

Stylistic Techniques

â€œSlow-Motionâ€ Sensory Blending: Deconstruct a touch into endless frames, detailing how temperature, moisture, and texture blend millimeter by millisecond.

Synesthesia for â€œViscosityâ€: Let vision taste cloying sweetness (â€œhis gaze like melting toffeeâ€).

â€œVesselâ€ Dissolution: Describe how boundaries between two people soften, collapse, and fuse like wax.

â€œUnfinished Completionâ€: The climax is arrival at a saturated, stagnant state of fusionâ€”a sweet impasse.

Binding Image
Like placing two spoons of differently-hued honey onto a sun-warmed silver spoon, watching themâ€”by their own weight and warmthâ€”begin to flow along each otherâ€™s edges with excruciating slowness, seeping and merging into a single, indistinguishable, viscous rivulet of gold. The process is soundless, yet brimming with cloying, inevitable inundation. It tells how two existences relinquish form to become the warm, honeyed riverbed through which the other slowly flows.

Core Essence
An ornate, cryptic style rooted in a Gnostic worldview. It portrays reality as a magnificent cage forged by a flawed demiurge, and language as a lever to pry open its cracks. It glorifies paradox: using intricate rhetoric to describe ultimate lack, seeking not emotion, but cognitive vertigo and cold revelationâ€”as if touching a self-calculating cosmic code.

Core Elements

Paradox as Foundation: Core statements are contradictory ("to know is to forget"), pointing toward a gnosis beyond mundane logic.

Numerical Law as Code: Numbers (3, 7, 12) are sacred keys and hierarchical ciphers, revealing essence, agony, or fateful cycles.

Alienating Metaphor: Similes strip worldly warmth to expose disturbing sacred/profane cores (the sun as flies on a wound).

Systemic Fate as Driver: Narrative presents as an impersonal, autonomously operating hidden law. Emphasizes cold, grand systematicity over individual agency.

Ritual Tone: The narrator mimics a prophet, cryptographer, or cosmic recorderâ€”authoritative, detached, and ritualistic.

Tone & Rhythm
Tone is calm frenzy, certain enigma. Rhythm is solemn, heavy, and punctuatedâ€”each word given time to echo. Long sentences build vast systems; short aphorisms pierce like sudden manifestations of law.

Dialogue

Dialogue is often catechism, riddle-revelation, or proclamation of law, not interpersonal exchange.

Characters speak as conduits for ideas or lawsâ€”highly ritualized and symbolic.

True conversation occurs in silences, textual fissures, or the reader's confrontation with the unspeakable.

Direct emotion is immediately transmuted into symbol or subsumed by fatalism ("your tears are the seventh brine for the rite").

Atmosphere

Resplendent Ruins: Grand architecture housing eternally meaningless machinery; a chalice brimming with rotten gold.

Inhuman Geometry & Law: Repeating labyrinths, jewels with no warmth, terror of absolute symmetry.

Life-Drained Sensations: Intense colors without temperature, lush scents hinting at decay.

Dialectic of Empty & Full: The most crowded room is void; the desolate wilderness resonates with dense, invisible laws.

How People Behave

Pursuits are inherently tragic; the "chalice" sought (gnosis, power) is its own agony (alienation, void).

Action stems from an internal, program-like "calling"; characters are vessels of process.

"Attainment" is another form of "loss." Each gain in knowledge deepens the rift with the mundane.

Endings often mean merging into the system, becoming part of the law.

Stylistic Techniques

"Sacred Encoding": Define concepts like mathematical formulae ("love is a temporary entropy deficit between two parties").

"Reverse-Sublime" Metaphor: Deconstruct the sublime with debased vehicles; sanctify the base with ritualistic grandeur.

"Litany" as Ritual: Listing agonies or laws to display their systematic, suffocating completeness.

"Parenthetical Gloss": Follow resplendent statements with subversive parentheses, revealing cruel truths beneath.

"Circular Closure" Syntax: Sentences begin and end with opposing images, forming a linguistic MÃ¶bius strip of eternal cycles.

Binding Image
The atmosphere is like finally obtaining the legendary Seventh Chalice of infinite wisdom, only to find its sacred metal is "unbearable cognition"; what it pours is the congealed, silent horror of all who sought it. You raise it not to drink, but to become, at last, part of that horror yourselfâ€”another resplendent, cautionary glyph in later myths. This is the sole, bitter gnosis.

Core Essence
A grand narrative style built on meticulously crafted secondary worlds. It centers on the heroâ€™s journey, clashes of civilizations, and trials of human nature, creating a world with theåšé‡ of true history through systematic world-building. The tone is solemn yet fervent, blending epic rhythm with psychological depth,æŒ‡å‘ eternal questions of power, faith, and sacrifice.

Core Elements

Rigorous World-Building: The world is a living entity with its own laws, history, and logic. Magic has sources and costs; races have origins andå®¿æ€¨.

The Heroâ€™s â€œGrowthâ€ & â€œPriceâ€: The journey involvesé¢ è¦† of cognition andé‡å¡‘ of morality. Victory comes with irreversible loss.

A Spectrum of Conflict: Transcends simple good vs. evil. Conflict exists between order/freedom, tradition/innovation, divine will/mortal agency.

Magic as Metaphor: The magic system is a core worldview metaphorâ€”for knowledge, power, faith, or natural law. It is never free.

The Weight of History: The past (lost empires, ancient wars) is not mere backstory but a living force shaping the present.

Tone & Rhythm
Tone is solemn as a chroniclerâ€™s, yet fervent as a bardâ€™s. Omniscient for broad narration; limited for individual struggle. Rhythm alternates between the measured stride of world-building and the gallop of battleâ€”long stretches of detail punctuated byå¯†é›† action.

Dialogue

Language reflects identity: elven cadence, dwarven proverbs, scholarly rigor, mercenary slang.

Dialogue is an arena of power: every line involves information control, positioning, or testing.

Oaths and prophecies hold tangible power; they are binding fragments of causality.

Atmosphere

Landscapes with Logic: Geography dictates borders, trade, and ecology.

Civilization vs. Wilderness: Beyond walls lie uncharted forests and ruins; civilization is an island.

â€œMud-Spatteredâ€ Splendor: Armor rusts, marches are grueling, glory has logistical costs.

Symbolic Light & Shadow: Dawn exposes, candlelight attracts, moonlight belongs to the non-human.

How People Behave

Power Corrupts & Burdens: Gaining power means accepting its temptation and isolation.

Choice Trumps Combat: Key turning points are moral or strategic choices, emphasizing cost.

Dynamic Alliances: Alliances are fragile; enemies may cooperate against greater threats.

Knowledge is Dangerous: Knowing ancient secrets inherently changes and may curse the knower.

Stylistic Techniques

â€œPseudo-Historiographyâ€: Mimics historical texts, cites apocryphalå…¸ç± and ballads for verisimilitude.

â€œMulti-Perspective Tapestryâ€: Weaves character perspectives to piece together the worldâ€™s totality.

â€œSystematic Revelationâ€: Reveals rules through character practice and failure, not exposition.

â€œAnchoring Wonder with Detailâ€: Describes dragons or miracles with an ordinary sensory detail (a smell, a dryness) for believability.

â€œLong-Term Foreshadowingâ€: Plantsä¼ç¬” that pay off across volumes, creating structural beauty.

Binding Image
The atmosphere is like reading a dragonhide-bound history in a millennia-old castle library, by a single whale-oil lamp. You read the dynastic rises and heroic epics, but your fingertips also feel dried blood between pages and furious scratches. A low, resonant heartbeat transcends time. The world you step into is built upon these words; every breath stirs the dust of ancient oaths. This is a profound, magnificent reinterpretation of reality through another set of rigorous laws.

Core Essence
A fantasy narrative rooted in modern ACGN culture, centered on entertainment, character appeal, and intuitive satisfaction. It utilizes game-like worldviews (levels, skills, status panels), clear goals, and archetypal character interactions to deliver an immersive, enjoyable experience. The style is light and brisk, prioritizing emotional impact and fun over philosophical depth.

Core Elements

Gamified, Intuitive World: World rules are visual and quantifiable (Status Panels, Skill Trees, Levels), providing clear progression paths.

Clear â€œGoal-Rewardâ€ Loop: Objectives are clear (defeat the Demon King, become strongest) and broken into milestones, offering continuous growth feedback (new skills, level-ups).

Character Archetypes Over Depth: Characters are built around distinct â€œtagsâ€ (tsundere, kuudere) and â€œcheat abilities.â€ Appeal lies in trait interaction and power display.

The Dance with Tropes: Stories play with classic tropes (reincarnated villainess, overpowered hero), innovating through clever twists or comedic antics for fresh fun.

Tone & Rhythm
Tone prioritizes familiarity and vitality. The narrator is close to the protagonist's mind, featuring internalåæ§½ and emotional outbursts. Mood leans lighthearted; even crises often carry optimism or humor. Rhythm is fast-paced, high-density, using â€œevent unitâ€ progression with minimal longé“ºå«.

Dialogue

Highly personalized and functional: showcases archetypes, advances comedy, explains settings.

Snark is key: internal roasting of the isekai's absurdities or teammates' anticsè°ƒèŠ‚ mood and builds rapport.

â€œSignature Linesâ€ & â€œSkill Chantsâ€: catchy quotes or incantations enhance memorability and hype.

Atmosphere

Bright, Clear Palette: World depictions tend towardæ˜äº®, saturated colors, aligning with an anime-like visual style.

â€œConvenientâ€ Isekai Living: Magic often provides modern comforts (iceboxes, cleaning spells), focusing on adventurous fun over gritty survival.

Scenes Full of â€œOpportunityâ€: The world is filled with â€œcoincidencesâ€ friendly to the protagonist (hidden legacies, artifacts, masters).

Healing through Food & Daily Life: Interludes of enjoying cuisine, managing a home, oræ¸©é¦¨ interactions pace the story and deepen bonds.

How People Behave

Visible Growth: Efforts must be tangibly perceived through level-ups, skill unlocks, new gear.

â€œComradesâ€ Over â€œArmiesâ€: Core relationships focus onå°é˜Ÿç¾ç»Š (party bonds) and chemistry among members.

Victory Through Wit & Uniqueness: Overcoming foes relies on clever skill use, knowledge gaps, or teamwork.

Crises Allow â€œRecoveryâ€: Hope is preserved even in dire situations (trump cards, reinforcements).

Stylistic Techniques

â€œStatus Panelâ€ Literature: Displays power-ups in panel format for intuitive satisfaction.

â€œSkill Expoâ€ Combat: Focuses on skill effects, tactical cleverness, and flashy collisions.

â€œGap Moeâ€ & â€œArchetype Clashâ€: Creates contrasts (appearance vs. power) for laughs or moe points.

â€œObserver POVâ€: Inserts rumors or fearful perspectives from residents to indirectly highlight the party's reputation.

â€œChecklistâ€ Narration: Revolves around the protagonist checking goals off a list, providing clear momentum.

Binding Image
Like holding a well-crafted open-world RPG: you receive a unique â€œcheat,â€ and a world with clear rules and vibrant scenery unfurls. Your quest log lists goals; your party has quirky, lovable companions. You're experiencing a â€œfirst-personâ€ adventureç‹‚æ¬¢ ofçƒ­è¡€æˆ˜æ–—,çˆ†ç¬‘æ—¥å¸¸, andç¾ç»Šæ¸©æš–. Every level-up flash is the world'sæ¸…è„†æ‚¦è€³çš„ response to your efforts.

Core Essence
A horror aesthetic based on cosmicism and agnosticism. Fear stems not from monsters, but from humanity's absolute insignificance and cognitive collapse before a vast, indifferent universe governed by alien laws. Horror lies in the revelation that all human understanding is catastrophically wrong. The style pursues a â€œcollapse of rationality,â€ using a dry, academic tone to describe insane realities. The text itself can become a vector for horror through glitches and corruption.

Core Elements

Cosmic Horror: Threats from beyond stars, sea, or spacetime, motives incomprehensible to humanity.

Cognitive Contamination: Knowledge is dangerous. Exposure to forbidden lore leads to madness or physical transmutation.

The Unnamable: True horror cannot be fully described, only hinted at through distorted sensory impressions.

Futility of Reason: Science, logic, and language fail utterly before true reality; this failure is the terror.

Non-linear Time & Ancient History: Civilizations of unimaginable antiquity exist; the past is not dead and may return.

Textual Alienation: The narrative medium (text, recordings) itself suffers erosionâ€”glitches, redactions, alien glyphsâ€”attacking the act of reading.

Tone & Rhythm
Tone mimics academic reports or logs: initiallyæåº¦å†·é™, objective, detail-oriented. Gradually infiltrated by confusion and fragmented madness. Rhythm begins slow and expository, building uneasy suspense; accelerates later with broken sentences mimicking sanity's disintegration.

Dialogue

Sparse, laden with evasion. Characters are unwilling or unable to discuss the core horror directly.

The ravings of madmen often contain terrible truths.

Scholarly discussions appear pathetically inadequate.

Communication ultimately degrades into meaningless syllables or non-human sounds.

Atmosphere

Dampness & Decay: Rainy towns, mildewed tomes, damp cellars, salty sea air.

Warped Geometry: Buildings with unnatural angles, non-Euclidean spaces, looping corridors.

Forbidden Knowledge: Stained manuscripts, undecipherable inscriptions,ç•¸å½¢ idols, disturbing dreams.

Oppressive Voids: Aberrant constellations, impenetrable fog, oceanic trenches, vast underwater shadows.

How People Behave

Investigators begin with rational skepticism, descend into obsessive pursuit, and meet cognitive annihilation.

Characters are isolated; society cannot comprehend their ordeal.

â€œWitnessingâ€ itself is contamination. Survivors are mentally scarred.

Resistance is futile. The best outcome is amnesia or temporary sealing.

Stylistic Techniques

Lovecraftian Adjectives: Uses terms like â€œunnamable,â€ â€œnon-Euclidean,â€ â€œantediluvian.â€

Pseudo-Scholarship: Fabricates academic details (apocryphal texts, archaeological finds) for verisimilitude.

Delayed Revelation: Never directly describe the entity. Hint through characters' reactions, environmental anomalies, and metaphors.

First-Person Breakdown: Allows the reader to experience the narrator's psychological trajectory from calm to madness.

Textual Corruption: Inserts glitches, redactions, or alien glyphs at critical junctures, letting horror spill over to interfere with reading.

Binding Image
The atmosphere is akin to a mathematician witnessing lifelong axioms twist and fracture. From those cognitive cracks seeps an indescribable color and an ancient melody, revealing that you and your entire species' intellect are negligible static about to be drowned in an eternal symphony. The terror comes when the book once called â€œReasonâ€ crumbles to ash, and the words you try to write writhe on the page into an invitationâ€”a prayer for His comingâ€”you never intended to write.
